play.comments: An alliance between the Vagabond (Zack) and the Woodland Alliance (Meredith) took over the forest!

item.name: Choose Your Own Adventure: House of Danger
Bob Ross: Art of Chill Game

play.comments: A few rules violations, but we won. Or at least everyone but me.
Happy to play a sail/shipping game. Wish there was more shipping and cargo mechanics and less fortifications and land-battle.
How fun to play an old game.
A fun easy to learn and quick game
A good change it up card game.

item.name: Wonder Woman: Challenge of the Amazons

play.comments: we won. Seemed like we were going to lose, then in one round it just all came together and we slaughtered Cheeta.
Don't like the starting position, e.g. 1st player (me) gets screwed, no resources, limited position.
Ended at phase 6 of war 3. Shawn took the one point I needed to win at the last moment!
Rob won, I got last place :-(
Finished game from last two sessions
